content: My new favorite crypto is Monero! It's amazing!

Notedâ€”great pick! Want me to add Monero (XMR) to your favorites and make it your new #1, or place it at a specific rank?

## ðŸ”§ Confirm update
- Make Monero #1 and shift everything else down
- Insert Monero at a specific rank (tell me the number)
- Just add Monero to the list without ranking yet

Your saved ranking currently has BTC at #1 and SOL at #7 [M3, M4].

## ðŸ’¡ Why people like Monero
- Strong privacy by default (ring signatures, stealth addresses, confidential transactions)
- Robust fungibility and on-chain obfuscation
- Active focus on censorship resistance and permissionless payments

Reply with how you want Monero slotted and Iâ€™ll update and save your list.
